lead_paragraph: Anthony Ervin of the United States reclaimed the mantle of fastest man in the water on Friday by taking the Olympic 50 meters freestyle gold medal 16 years after he first won it, and  by the slimmest of margins.

headline.main: Swimming: Ervin Wins Gold 16 Years After His First
headline.print_headline: Swimming: Ervin Wins Gold 16 Years After His First

snippet: Anthony Ervin of the United States reclaimed the mantle of fastest man in the water on Friday by taking the Olympic 50 meters freestyle gold medal 16 years after he first won it, and  by the slimmest of margins....
